myfuel.DBHandler

Class MMReportDBHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • myfuel.DBHandler.DBHandler
      • myfuel.DBHandler.MMReportDBHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class MMReportDBHandler
extends DBHandler
    This class will has the necessary queries and methods to get the details for the Marketing Manager reports
